content.text: Hi! I’m (name), how are you?
Hello! I’m (name), I’m doing well! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to take care of animals, play video games, and read. What about you?
I like to play video games too! My favorite kind of video game is RPGs. And I also love to watch magicians like Penn and Teller.
Penn and Teller are awesome! I’ve seen them perform live before.
That’s so cool! I wish I could see them perform live someday.
I think you would really enjoy it. They’re so funny and talented.
I bet I would!
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is classic rock.
Nice! I love classic rock too. My favorite band is The Beatles.
The Beatles are great! I love their music.
Me too! What’s your favorite Beatles song?
I don’t know if I could pick just one favorite song, but I really like “Here Comes the Sun”.
That’s a great song! I love that one too.
Me too!
I also like “Yellow Submarine” and “I Want to Hold Your Hand”.
Those are both great songs too!
I think we have similar taste in music.
I think so too
